org.writeforward.logger

Class WriteForwardConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.writeforward.logger.WriteForwardConfiguration

  • public class WriteForwardConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all of the information the Log class needs to do its work. The Log class is mostly concerned with creating the messages using the message builder.
    Author:
    Matt
